introduction.p1: Gluco Check brings Nightscout to your Google Assistant. Ask it things like Hey Google, ask Gluco Check...
introduction.features1: my blood sugar / my BG / my glucose / ...
introduction.features2: my insulin on board / IOB / insulin
introduction.features3: my carbs on board / COB / carbs
introduction.features5: How old is my cannula / When did I insert my cannula?

welcome.title: Welcome to Gluco Check
welcome.content: Content about the product, more practical scenarios featuring ways to use it in your life in novel ways.

settings.title: Edit Settings
settings.content: Content about how the product must connect to your nightscout site in order to work.

nightscoutToken.default: Not sure how to get a token? Read on!
nightscoutToken.invalid: Your Nightscout site is not accepting this token

nightscoutUrl.notNightscout: This URL does not point to a Nightscout site
nightscoutUrl.needsUpgrade: Your Nightscout site requires an update to work with Gluco Check, please update to at least {{version}}

defaultMetrics.default: Assistant will read these items to you by default
defaultMetrics.notAvailable: We did not find a recent value for these metrics, but you can still select them

glucoseUnits.mismatch: Chosen unit differs from your Nightscout site's units

submitStatus.error: Something has gone horribly wrong saving your settings

tokenDialog.title: Generating a Nightscout token
tokenDialog.preamble: For basic features like checking your numbers, your Nightscout url is enough. For more advanced features, you're going to need a token with full api read permissions. If you don't know what that means, don't sweat it! We'll go through it one step at a time.

step1.label: Check Nightscout Version
step1.description: First, make sure your site is on at least version 14 of Nightscout. You can check the version here by clicking on the hamburger menu button and looking here:

step2.label: Update Nightscout
step2.description: If you do need an upgrade, you can read more about how to do that <2>here</2>. If not, let's make that token!

step3.label: Create Role and Subject
step3.description: Click on the hamburger menu, then "Admin Tools".

step4.description: Click on "Add new Role", populate the Role with the values pictured below, and click save.

step5.description: Click on "Add new Subject", populate the Subject with the values pictured below, and click save.

step6.description: Copy the value in the "Access Token" column, paste it into the Nightscout Token field in <2>Gluco-Check Settings</2>, and click save.
